bill.summary: 9/26/1996--Reported to House amended. Civil Rights Commission Act of 1996 - Amends the Civil Rights Commission Act of 1983 to extend the date for termination of the United States Commission on Civil Rights. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the Act. Requires a majority vote of the Commission to issue a subpoena. Authorizes removal of the Commission's staff director by a majority vote. Includes the Commission in the term "agency" for purposes of the Freedom of Information Act, the Privacy Act of 1974, and the Government in the Sunshine Act.
